text: The new iPhone 17 Pro devices have additional Apple Intelligence features
full-pick-text: The new iPhone 17 Pro devices have additional Apple Intelligence features
notes:
• "They have more RAM than other iPhones and can run on-device models faster."
  • "The 17 Pros can run the 7B version of Apple Foundation Model on-device"
  • "The 17 Pros get new image and/or camera related AI features"
